name: Plattformer (MoGamer09)
description:
Plattformer is a wrong spelled game with an all the better gameplay. Its styled in a simple minimalistic and futuristic way and can be a relaxed jump and run like game, or an intense racing game with multiplayer to play and battle yourself with friends. At the moment its in the process of playtesting and developing so you can feel free to leave some feedback and I hope you enjoy it!

If you wonder how (bad) I made the game, and why there are two t, you can check out my videos  here.

The versions uploaded here are likely to be further developed then the Verion you saw in the last video, so if you don't want spoilers... don't download it quite yet, on the other hand, you can see it as a teaser.

This release is my 10 subscriber special, so.. if you don't mind bringing that number up a bit please check out my videos and leave a sub!

Also face reveal at 10000 downloads! lol
